might.name: Might
might.description: Lift heavy objects, fight with might weapons and overpower your enemies.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: Dodge out of the way, fight with agility weapons and sneak.

intellect.name: Intellect
intellect.description: Recall facts, use magical weapons and solve puzzles.

fortitude.name: Fortitude
fortitude.description: Survive physical blows, injuries and harsh conditions.

presence.name: Presence
presence.description: Coerce, or threaten others and keep your calm in situations.

cunning.name: Cunning
cunning.description: Notice important things, craft items and outwit your foes.
